context: Expedia Group, Inc. is a online travel platform focused on travel booking, vacation rentals, and travel technology. Travel recovery. One Key loyalty program. AI travel planning.

competitors.name: Booking Holdings
competitors.notes: Largest OTA with Booking.com global leadership

competitors.name: Google Travel
competitors.notes: Travel search and planning with AI capabilities

competitors.name: Hopper
competitors.notes: Mobile travel fintech with price prediction

competitors.notes: Hotel chains with strong loyalty programs
